message.content: {"id": "23935", "title": "Bug 23935 - Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus", "description": "Both widgets are children of the shell. The issue only occurs on Windows. To work around this issue, we can create the text editor as a sibling of the tree and move it above the tree.", "OB": "When clicking anywhere in the tree, the tree gains focus and the text widget does not lose focus.", "EB": "The text widget should lose focus when clicking anywhere in the tree.", "SR": "Ensure that clicking anywhere in the tree causes the text widget to lose focus."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '23935', 'title': 'Bug 23935Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus', 'description': 'Both widgets are children ofthe shell.The right tree and text only work on Windows. We can probably work around by creating thetext editor as a sibling of the tree and moving it above the tree. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'When youclick anywhere in the tree the tree gets focus. '}
